text: my name is Kyle PW I am director of SAS
platform development and I work for
Pitney Bose Pitney Bose is a global
technology company it has 100 year old
history of helping customers to succeed
in the world of Commerce we evaluated
Cloud vendors and we were primarily
looking for three things we wanted
cost-effective infrastructure we wanted
a reliable solution that would be
commensurate with the brand that we had
at Pitney BOS and we wanted developer
productivity after looking at a number
of vendors we selected AWS primarily
based upon cost- effective
infrastructure they provided and the
tools that they were giving our
developers were just tremendous we
understood that in order to succeed and
become a really digital company we have
to move fast recently we've partnered
with AWS to bring our location
intelligence apis to the AWS Marketplace
SAS these apis are going to be able to
be consumed by developers or Enterprises
that are looking to add location
intelligence capabilities into their
applications when we look at our
Commerce Cloud platform it's a
e-commerce and commerce enabler that
helps our customers get access to um all
our assets that we developed through the
history of the company we had a number
of workloads that were running in our
on- premise uh data center that were
windows-based workloads and these are
workloads that were supporting our
Global e-commerce business really high
volume critical workloads that needed to
be moved we selected AWS for that move
and within 5 months we were able to do a
full move without disrupting our
customers at all we had zero downtime
with the move and also our development
team they were able to remain productive
throughout that entire shift in terms of
speeded and Agility tools like elastic
beant stock and Docker really allow our
developers to focus on building
application code and new feature content
we were incredibly uh attracted to a WS
for several reasons we loved the um
really extensive set of the services
that it could provide not only
infrastructure but really manage
services no more um our developers
creating tickets winning for our
centralized it team to spin up they can
instantly spin up new um servers as
needed to support their Dynamic
workloads we are very focused on making
our customers successful and we were
looking for the partner who is equally
dedicated to the success of customers
and we felt that AWS is definitely the
company that will help us to get there
